description:
See http://paste.openstack.org/show/2051/

When using an image without an agent, compute complains of improper string formatting, and then implies the instance didn't boot. However, the instance is available and actually shows up as active in the instance list. This just appears to be some bad error handling around a syntax error.
title: Images with no guest agent aren't handled gracefully

comments.content:
See http://paste.openstack.org/show/2051/

When using an image without an agent, compute complains of improper string formatting, and then implies the instance didn't boot. However, the instance is available and actually shows up as active in the instance list. This just appears to be some bad error handling around a syntax error.
